task.title: Javier Needs to Eat Breakfast
task.shortdesc: Javier needs to start off his day with a healthy breakfast.

taskbody.context: A healthy breakfast is key for any striving Hokie. Javier is no different!

step.cmd: Get off the couch and go to the fridge.
Select from either the yogurt, milk for cereal, or the leftover pizza.
You obviously chose the pizza, heat that bad boy up in the microwave.
Get a paper towel from under the sink so we don't dirty dishes.
